personal.name: Eugene Chekan
personal.title: Software Engineer in Test
personal.about: Experienced Software Engineer in Test with 4+ years of expertise in test automation, embedded systems, and quality engineering. Passionate about building robust testing frameworks and automation solutions for complex IoT, healthcare, and telecommunications projects. Proven track record of implementing custom testing tools, enhancing CI/CD pipelines, and delivering high-quality software solutions across diverse technical domains. Self-motivated problem solver with strong analytical skills and a keen eye for detail.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

experience.title: Software Test Automation Engineer
experience.description: Led end-to-end testing for Dedicated Medicare Operating Model (DMOM) migration across 5 value streams. Enhanced testing framework with custom Robot Framework libraries and automated complex enrollment scenarios.

experience.title: Software Test Automation Engineer
experience.description: Developed test automation for Intelligent Lighting system for smart city infrastructure. Created automated test cases, maintained project backlog, and investigated field device issues with IoT devices.

experience.title: Software Test Automation Engineer
experience.description: Worked on Alphabot warehouse delivery robots project. Ported Python2 to Python3 wrappers, implemented custom client utilities for robot control, and developed test automation frameworks.

experience.title: Software Test Automation Engineer
experience.description: Performed functional testing for embedded lighting control devices and Quectel modem firmware. Contributed to test automation framework development using Pytest.

experience.title: Student/Trainee
experience.description: Worked on Disaster Recovery design and implementation. Created AWS instances using Terraform and performed E2E testing of video streaming applications.

projects.title: Backend for 'idre.me' dream-analysis web app.
projects.description: Developed a backend for 'idre.me' dream-analysis web app. The app allows users to analyze their dreams and get insights into their subconscious.

projects.title: Python KISS DB Implementation
projects.description: Created a Python implementation of KISS database system for embedded applications.

projects.title: Robot Command & Control Utility
projects.description: Implemented custom client utility for commanding and controlling warehouse delivery robots.

projects.title: Hawkbit Protocol Client
projects.description: Developed custom client to support communication over Hawkbit protocol for IoT device management.

projects.title: Healthcare Robot Framework Library
projects.description: Created custom Robot Framework library for healthcare enrollment management application testing.
